channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from cliffy_jr

item.title: You won’t immediately outgrow your smaller-cc motorcycle. Riding is about more than a straight line it’s about control, confidence, and enjoying every twist. #motorcycle #SmallBikeBigFun #RideBeyondSpeed #TwoWheelWisdom #MotoMindset

item.title: Don’t hesitate. ✅ Look ahead ✅ Pick your gap ✅ Throttle up ✅ Merge with purpose Confidence and timing are everything—ride like you belong there. #motorcycle #FreewayMerge #ThrottleControl #RideWithConfidence #HighwaySkills #TwoWheelTips
item.description: Don’t hesitate. ✅ Look ahead ✅ Pick your gap ✅ Throttle up ✅ Merge with purpose Confidence and timing are everything—ride like you belong there. #motorcycle #FreewayMerge #ThrottleControl #RideWithConfidence #HighwaySkills #TwoWheelTips

item.title: Being single is great… but falling in love with your best friend? That’s on a whole different level. Real connection. Real peace. Real love. #LoveAndFriendship #BestFriendLove #RealConnection #GratefulHeart #MoreThanJustRiding @Shannon

item.title: Just because you’ve been hurt in the past doesn’t mean those memories should guide your future. Heal. Grow. Move forward with intention—not fear. You’re allowed to create something better. #HealingJourney #LetGoOfThePast #GrowForward #EmotionalFreedom #Ch

item.title: Traffic comes to a stop don’t panic, keep your eyes up and your speed down for sudden movements from cars. ##motorcycle##moto##traffictips##whatdoyouride
item.description: Traffic comes to a stop don’t panic, keep your eyes up and your speed down for sudden movements from cars. ##motorcycle##moto##traffictips##whatdoyouride

item.title: Keep your head up—don’t stare at the dash. If you’re unsure what gear you’re in, feel it, don’t guess. Downshift or upshift until you’re in the right gear for the moment. Smooth riding is all about awareness and adjustment. #motorcycle #RideByFeel #ShiftS
item.description: Keep your head up—don’t stare at the dash. If you’re unsure what gear you’re in, feel it, don’t guess. Downshift or upshift until you’re in the right gear for the moment. Smooth riding is all about awareness and adjustment. #motorcycle #RideByFeel #ShiftS
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.description: The skinnier the bike, the easier the split #motorcycle

item.title: It’s always fun seeing other motorcycle riders on the freeway. Lane splitting with multiple bikes always feels better and safer. #Motorcycle #moto

item.title: Right turns = tighter space, more precision. Look where you want to go, set up early, lean in smoothly, and keep a steady throttle. Don’t rush it—ride it clean. #motorcycle #RightTurnTips #CorneringSkills #BeginnerRider #RideSmooth
item.description: Right turns = tighter space, more precision. Look where you want to go, set up early, lean in smoothly, and keep a steady throttle. Don’t rush it—ride it clean. #motorcycle #RightTurnTips #CorneringSkills #BeginnerRider #RideSmooth
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: When I was making this, I didn’t realize that it was four minutes long, but I’m glad I got to explain everything. Here is basically everything you need to know about how to ride a motorcycle.
item.description: When I was making this, I didn’t realize that it was four minutes long, but I’m glad I got to explain everything. Here is basically everything you need to know about how to ride a motorcycle.

item.title: Congratulations to all the new riders! There is no such thing as a perfect starter bike. There is only the bike you start on and that bike will be perfect for you. Don’t get caught up, thinking you need a brand new bike, you don’t. Used bikes are often gr
item.description: Congratulations to all the new riders! There is no such thing as a perfect starter bike. There is only the bike you start on and that bike will be perfect for you. Don’t get caught up, thinking you need a brand new bike, you don’t. Used bikes are often gr
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.description: How long did it take you to get comfortable with the friction zone? #motorcycle #moto #beginnermotorcycle #howtorideamotorcycle

item.title: Your motorcycle has three types of braking—and knowing when to use each one is key. ✅ Front brake – Strongest stopping power. Use progressively, not suddenly. Most of your braking should come from here. ✅ Rear brake – Great for low-speed control and stabi
item.description: Your motorcycle has three types of braking—and knowing when to use each one is key. ✅ Front brake – Strongest stopping power. Use progressively, not suddenly. Most of your braking should come from here. ✅ Rear brake – Great for low-speed control and stabi
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Let’s talk about making turns on a motorcycle • Look where you want to go – Your bike will follow your eyes. • Set up early – Slow down before the turn, not during it. • Lean with the bike – Don’t fight the lean, trust it. • Throttle control – Smooth
item.description: Let’s talk about making turns on a motorcycle • Look where you want to go – Your bike will follow your eyes. • Set up early – Slow down before the turn, not during it. • Lean with the bike – Don’t fight the lean, trust it. • Throttle control – Smooth
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: It’s great to see more and more female riders showing up and taking over the road. Representation matters. Keep riding, keep inspiring. #motorcycle #WomenWhoRide #MotoCommunity #RideConfident #SheRidesToo
item.description: It’s great to see more and more female riders showing up and taking over the road. Representation matters. Keep riding, keep inspiring. #motorcycle #WomenWhoRide #MotoCommunity #RideConfident #SheRidesToo
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Left turns take planning and confidence. Slow down before the turn, look through the corner, and lean with the bike. Smooth in, steady out. #motorcycle #LeftTurnTips #RideSmart #CorneringSkills #TwoWheelControl
item.description: Left turns take planning and confidence. Slow down before the turn, look through the corner, and lean with the bike. Smooth in, steady out. #motorcycle #LeftTurnTips #RideSmart #CorneringSkills #TwoWheelControl
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Freeway on-ramps are all about timing and throttle. Get your head up, pick your gap, and throttle up confidently. #motorcycle #FreewayMerge #OnRampTips #HighwaySkills #RideWithPurpose
item.description: Freeway on-ramps are all about timing and throttle. Get your head up, pick your gap, and throttle up confidently. #motorcycle #FreewayMerge #OnRampTips #HighwaySkills #RideWithPurpose
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Roll off the throttle, pull in the clutch, shift down, and ease the clutch out. Optional: blip the throttle to match engine speed. Downshifting should be smooth, not jarring. #motorcycle #DownshiftingTips #RideSmooth #ClutchControl #ThrottleDiscipline
item.description: Roll off the throttle, pull in the clutch, shift down, and ease the clutch out. Optional: blip the throttle to match engine speed. Downshifting should be smooth, not jarring. #motorcycle #DownshiftingTips #RideSmooth #ClutchControl #ThrottleDiscipline
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Your bike goes where you look. Don’t stare at your dash or your bars—keep your eyes up and trust the feel of the bike beneath you. #motorcycle #RideByFeel #HeadUpRideRight #ThrottleControl #MotoMindset
item.description: Your bike goes where you look. Don’t stare at your dash or your bars—keep your eyes up and trust the feel of the bike beneath you. #motorcycle #RideByFeel #HeadUpRideRight #ThrottleControl #MotoMindset
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: It’s not about engine size, brand, or build. Just ride what makes you feel good, and keep showing up. #motorcycle #RideYourRide #AllBikesWelcome #TwoWheelsOneLove #MotoFreedom
item.description: It’s not about engine size, brand, or build. Just ride what makes you feel good, and keep showing up. #motorcycle #RideYourRide #AllBikesWelcome #TwoWheelsOneLove #MotoFreedom
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Freeway connectors are long, fast curves. Look all the way through the turn, lean with confidence, and maintain steady throttle. #motorcycle #FreewayConnector #TurnWithConfidence #CorneringTips #RideSmooth
item.description: Freeway connectors are long, fast curves. Look all the way through the turn, lean with confidence, and maintain steady throttle. #motorcycle #FreewayConnector #TurnWithConfidence #CorneringTips #RideSmooth
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: If you’ve never been to a rave, put it on your list. Music, energy, and freedom—it’s a vibe you have to feel for yourself. #RaveCulture #LiveTheMoment #MusicAndMotion #GoodVibesOnly
item.description: If you’ve never been to a rave, put it on your list. Music, energy, and freedom—it’s a vibe you have to feel for yourself. #RaveCulture #LiveTheMoment #MusicAndMotion #GoodVibesOnly
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Front brake = main stopping power. Rear brake = stability and low-speed control. Engine brake = roll off the throttle to slow the bike naturally. Learn to use all three for smooth, safe riding. #motorcycle #BrakeControl #FrontBrake #RearBrake #EngineBraki
item.description: Front brake = main stopping power. Rear brake = stability and low-speed control. Engine brake = roll off the throttle to slow the bike naturally. Learn to use all three for smooth, safe riding. #motorcycle #BrakeControl #FrontBrake #RearBrake #EngineBraki
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Before you turn, slow down and look where you want to go. Use steady throttle through the corner and trust your lean. #motorcycle #LeftTurnPractice #RideControl #CorneringBasics #TwoWheelSkills
item.description: Before you turn, slow down and look where you want to go. Use steady throttle through the corner and trust your lean. #motorcycle #LeftTurnPractice #RideControl #CorneringBasics #TwoWheelSkills
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Stalls happen. Don’t panic. Restart, clutch in, throttle steady, and try again. Every rider goes through it—it’s how you learn. #motorcycle #StallRecovery #BeginnerRider #RideWithPatience #ClutchWork
item.description: Stalls happen. Don’t panic. Restart, clutch in, throttle steady, and try again. Every rider goes through it—it’s how you learn. #motorcycle #StallRecovery #BeginnerRider #RideWithPatience #ClutchWork
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Emergency braking isn’t about slamming—it’s about smooth, progressive pressure. Squeeze the front brake, use the rear to stabilize, and don’t panic. Practice in a parking lot. #motorcycle #EmergencyBraking #BrakePractice #RidePrepared #StopWithControl
item.description: Emergency braking isn’t about slamming—it’s about smooth, progressive pressure. Squeeze the front brake, use the rear to stabilize, and don’t panic. Practice in a parking lot. #motorcycle #EmergencyBraking #BrakePractice #RidePrepared #StopWithControl
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Let’s practice riding a motorcycle. Stalling is a normal part of learning how to ride and even when you learn how you still stall sometimes too. #Motorcycle #Moto #Stall #LearnHowToRideAMotorcycle
item.description: Let’s practice riding a motorcycle. Stalling is a normal part of learning how to ride and even when you learn how you still stall sometimes too. #Motorcycle #Moto #Stall #LearnHowToRideAMotorcycle
